documents.document: “Weekly Writing Challenge: A Manner of Speaking” A recent challenge issued by WordPress’s “The Daily Post” was to discuss slang or colloquialisms.  Although I live in the vicinity of New York City, and have for a couple of decades (a coon’s age) now, I was born in, and spent most of my life in, North […]

I originally wrote this post earlier this week, and am just now getting around to finishing it. Cruising through the internet (where everything is true, and nobody fabricates anything, ever), I found the following facebook post, which had been shared by an online friend of mine.   “By XXXX XXXXX So Westboro showed […]
Got Any Duck Food?.

I’m not sure who originally came up with this one. I heard it from a friend…in a bar, of course. So, a duck walks into a bar one afternoon, jumps right up on the bar, and says to the bartender, “got any duck food?” The bartender, who’s quite busy, gives the duck a quick once […]
